title: UBS’s post-takeover rules for Credit Suisse staff
description: Brace for significant shifts in business operations as UBS, one of the world’s largest and most influential banks, readies for the monumental takeover of its competitor, Credit Suisse. As the day of fusion approaches, there is a palpable sense of anticipation and stringent restrictions prepared for the incoming Credit Suisse bankers. A red line approach ... Read more

title: Saudi Arabia says it doesn’t want to compete with China
description: Navigating a rapidly changing global economic landscape, Saudi Arabia sets its sights on bolstering ties with China rather than challenging the East Asian giant’s dominant status, according to recent comments by the Kingdom’s Energy Minister Prince Abdulaziz bin Salman. A pivot towards collaboration between Saudi Arabia and China In an interview with CNBC during the ... Read more
